event.title: I Love Free Software Day in Barcelona, Spain

body.p: Let us celebrate the 2026 ‘I Love Free Software Day’ together in Barcelona! On the 14. February we get together at the Akasha Hub, 19 Carrer de la Verneda, Barcelona, and show our appreciation for all the maintainers, contributors, and people behind Free Software. Together, we recognise the importance of their efforts and dedication in creating a free and open digital world for everyone.

Date: 14th February 2026, 19:00 (local time)
Programme:
19:00: Welcome
19:15: Brief introduction to Free Software and Lightning Talks*
20:00: Celebration and networking
Location: Akasha Hub, 19 Carrer de la Verneda, Unit 1 · Barcelona
Registration (optional): here
Come and share this special day with us! There will be food and drink for all attendees.
* The Lightning Talks will be 5 minutes long. If you would like to take part, please email friends@bcnfs.org.
